nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates receiver address in the xDai chain
@param _receiverInXDai address of new receiver account in the xDai chain

attributes.name: InterestReceiver
setBridgeContract

attributes.documentation:
@dev Updates receiver address in the xDai chain
@param _receiverInXDai address of new receiver account in the xDai chain
attributes.name: setReceiverInXDai

attributes.documentation:
@dev ERC677 transfer callback function, received interest is converted from Chai token into Dai
and then relayed via bridge to xDai receiver
attributes.name: onTokenTransfer
claimTokens

params._token: address of claimed token, address(0) for native

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: ERC677 transfer callback function, received interest is converted from Chai token into Dai and then relayed via bridge to xDai receiver

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setBridgeContract(address).details: Updates bridge contract from which interest is expected to come from, the incoming tokens will be relayed through this bridge also

params._bridgeContract: address of new contract in the foreign chain

setReceiverInXDai(address).details: Updates receiver address in the xDai chain

params._receiverInXDai: address of new receiver account in the xDai chain

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
